comment.author: 7701600@N03
comment._content: I love studying the components. The chubbier unformed hands, arms and upper torso says she is possibly in her late teens yet her face could be in her very, very late 20's plus!

comment.author: 8040300@N05
comment._content: I'm thinking engagement portrait or just after wedding portrait.  It's because of how she's holding her hand to show off the ring. It's on the right hand, which in some cultures is the hand on which is worn the wedding ring.

comment.author: 8343925@N05
comment._content: Daguerreotypes are "reversed" images, like looking at yourself in a mirror, so it looks like her right hand, but the ring is really on her left hand

comment.author: 29650224@N05
comment._content: i think she looks quite a bit older, actually. like maybe 40s. it seems strange to me that she might be a bride!

comment.author: 47770417@N03
comment._content: She may be the mother of the bride. Or dressed up for an occasion of some kind. Those hairstyles did not flatter anyone over thirty.
